mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( m_num, m_name, m_email, m_tel, m_addr, m_grade ) VALUES ( #{mNum}, #{mName}, #{mEmail}, #{mTel}, #{mAddr}, #{mGrade} )
mapper.select: SELECT m_num as mNum, m_name as mName, m_email as mEmail, m_tel as mTel, m_addr as mAddr, m_grade as mGrade FROM member WHERE m_num LIKE #{mNum} || '%'
